content: step 32 - step 33 for the rest of the round but substitute last ch7 of the round with ch3 dtr in marked st 35 3rd picot round as for 2nd picot round steps 31 - 34 mark last dtr 36 last round ch5 slip_stitch in each ch7 space all the way around slip_stitch into marked dtr fasten off yarn weave in yarn tails for a professional looking final appearance block in a manner that is suitable for the fibre used for more information please keep in touch ● i will be publishing free patterns in my ravelry pattern shop lisa hounshell designs as they become available ● subscribe to my youtube channel https //youtube com/@breakawaycrochet to be notified of new video tutorials ● general information and motif library can be found on the breakawaycrochet com website ● if you have questions or would like to share your finished item join the breakaway crochet method | support and chat on facebook copyright 2024 lisa hounshell 7
